reviews.review_text: One of my favorite books EVER
I enjoy Nora Roberts stories with a mystery and a bit of the supernatural. This one gave me exactly what i look for in this genre.

Excellent book in true Nora Roberts style complete with ghosts who gave the book an interesting twist. I also enjoyed the setting in cajun country which helped give it it's flavor.  I Highly recommend it to any Nora Roberts fan.
Interesting  story  to  this  New Orleans native,  thanks  for another  great  novel  Nora Roberts!!
Could not put it down!! Another great Nora Roberts mystery!!

Not as thrilled with this story.  Seemed a bit weird right at the beginning and took mind games with the plot.  Story line was okay, I guess, for some people but not my favorite read.  I like Nora Roberts usually but this was not to my liking.
Great service.  I love this book and enjoy reading novels by Nora Roberts.  Thanks for the quick response time.

title: Midnight Bayou
word_cloud: favorite ever enjoy story mystery bit supernatural give exactly look genre favorite excellent true style complete ghost give interesting twist also enjoy set cajun country help flavor highly recommend fan good story great interest story native thanks great put great mystery not thrill story bit weird right begin take mind game plot line okay guess people favorite usually like service love enjoy read novel quick response time
summary:
#1 New York Times bestselling author Nora Roberts presents a novel set deep in the bayou of Louisiana—where the only witness to a long-ago tragedy is a once-grand house…

Declan Fitzgerald had always been the family maverick, but even he couldn't understand his impulse to buy a dilapidated mansion on the outskirts of New Orleans. Ever since he first saw Manet Hall, he'd been enchanted—and obsessed—with it.

Determined to restore the mansion to its former splendor, Declan begins the daunting renovation room by room. But the days spent in total isolation in the empty house take a toll. He is seeing visions of days from a century past and experiencing sensations of terror and nearly unbearable grief. Local legend has it that the house is haunted, and with every passing day Declan's belief in the ghostly presence grows.

Only the companionship of alluring Angelina Simone can distract him from the mysterious happenings in the house, but Angelina has her own surprising connection to Manet Hall—a connection that will help Declan uncover a secret that's been buried for a hundred years.
story_arc: The story gets better over time
